## IHidChannel.getFeatureReport() method

Returns a feature [IHidReport](./jabra-js.ihidreport.md) from the device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFeatureReport(usagePage: number, usage: number): Observable<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  usagePage | number | The Usage Page of the feature report. |
|  usage | number | The Usage of the report. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Observable&lt;number&gt;

The current value of the feature.
